original_title: 自分の味方がいる状況（ホーム）では、僕に屈辱的なひどいイジメをしてきたり、調子に乗っている超強気JKは、味方が誰もいない1人ぼっちの状況（アウェイ）になった途端、僕をイジめてもこない、おとなしい超弱気JKに…！～
overview: I'm being bullied and bullied by girls. Now I have a chance to get revenge on the strong-willed girl who is always the center of bullying! ! They were actually super Zako characters when they were alone! That's why I got revenge for all the bullying I've done to the always strong woman who was forced into an isolated situation! Moreover, it is also naughty!
title: When The Aggressive High School Girl Who Gets Cocky And Bullies Me When She's With Her Friends Is Suddenly Left Alone With No Friends She Stops Bullying Me And Turns Into A Timid High School Girl…! –
